location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: The name of the provider monitor setting.

kind.description: Provider registration kind. This Metadata is also used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type.

name.description: The name of the resource provider hosted within ProviderHub.

kind.description: Resource type registration kind. This Metadata is also used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type.

resourceTypes.description: The resource types from the defined resource types in the provider namespace that the application can access. If no resource types are specified and the role is service owner, the default is * which is all resource types

role.description: The ownership role the application has on the resource types. The service owner role gives the application owner permissions. The limited owner role gives elevated permissions but does not allow all the permissions of a service owner, such as read/write on internal metadata.

managedByRoleDefinitionId.description: The managed by role definition ID for the application.

roleDefinitionId.description: The role definition ID for the application.

dataAuthorizations.description: The authorizations that determine the level of data access permissions on the specified resource types.

refreshSubscriptionRegistration.description: Whether refreshing subscription registration is enabled or disabled.

releaseScopes.description: The list of ARM regions scoped for the release.

skipReleaseScopeValidation.description: Whether release scope validation should be skipped.
